name: Gravity Runner (itch)
description:
Use gravity to your advantage to collect gems!

This game was made for the United Game Jam 2020 event with a 48 hour time limit where the theme was "Two". Here I use gravity to move the player up or down in order to get the gems, either good gold or bad ruby.

Just click left mouse button or "Space" (or tap if on Android) to invert the gravity!

Thanks to Tallbeard Studios for the amazing music assets
- Three Red Hearts - Prepare to Dev Edition
of which i used the tracks:
- Abstraction - Three Red Hearts - Rabbit Town
- Abstraction - Three Red Hearts - Box Jump

Thanks to godgoldfear for the free Low Poly Gems Pack 2 assets, where I used a mesh for the collectible gem.

Thanks to Kenney for the sound effects in the asset pack Kenney Game Assets 1.

Have fun!
